purpose: Showcase Titanverse smart consultation workflow through visual explainer, demonstrating AI-powered features including template selection, live transcription, auto-filled notes, and AI support.
core_message: Titanverse = the smartest consult you've ever run. Everything in one place for pharmacy services.
summary: Single image feature workflow explainer showing Titanverse consultation flow: selecting a template, live transcription capturing speech, automatically populated patient notes, and final summary. Visual workflow demonstrates AI support at every step with 'Ask me anything' AI assistance.
